name: TE Offroad +
description:
The complete version of the most intense offroad experience on mobile.

Free demo - https://goo.gl/PL0OwU

- No Ads
- No Microtransactions
- Full version with all vehicles, maps, and no ads.
- Five extreme Off-road vehicles.
- Massive Free Roam levels, Desert, Arctic, and the Moon.
- Race for Gold in dozens of fast paced Time Trials.
- Beat your high score in Fuel Runs where you race against the clock by collecting valuable fuel.
- Control jumps and land tricks with Air Control options.
- Fast paced gameplay with tight controls.
- High-Def graphics and detailed physics.
- Quality options for smooth gameplay on most devices.
- Plans for updates with more vehicles, maps, tracks, and more.
